content: Let me also share THIS little gift with you. — I have dogs that I love more than I can describe. I adore them, and whenever they do something even as small as take a pee, or respond to their name I say enthusiastically, “GOOD GIRL!!!” because they bring me joy and because I love them so much. And then one day I wondered why I don’t put the same (simple) effort into encouraging myself? — — We often feel it’s unnecessary (or selfish) to give to ourselves what we happily give to others.  — — — — —I made toast. GOOD GIRL!!! I got up, got dressed, and went to work. GOOD GIRL!!! It certainly doesn’t hurt and your subconscious likes to hear it. I just have to work on not saying it outloud in the grocery store. :o) ❤ ❤
